This model just launched at $210, joining the rest of UGREEN’s growing NAS lineup, and today’s deal marks the first discount we’ve seen. It’s not a massive markdown, but the 10% savings definitely make it a bit easier on the wallet. Something like this would be ideal anyone constantly running out of storage or juggling multiple SSDs and HDDs. It offers a more streamlined way to manage your files, and you can learn more about it in detail below.

items.title: How plastic whistles are becoming an anti-ICE resistance tool in Chicago
items.summary: CHICAGO (Reuters) -As the shrill sound of whistles echoed through a parking garage in Chicago's North Side on Tuesday, two people flung their car doors open, ducked inside and shrank down into their seats. items.title: Alibaba launches a free consumer-focused AI chatbot in its Quark app, powered by Qwen 3, and plans to open pre-sales for its $660 Quark AI Glasses on October 24 (Reuters)
items.summary:
Reuters:
Alibaba launches a free consumer-focused AI chatbot in its Quark app, powered by Qwen 3, and plans to open pre-sales for its $660 Quark AI Glasses on October 24  —  Alibaba (9988.HK) launched a new AI chatbot assistant service on Thursday, refreshing its push into a consumer-facing space that is dominated by ByteDance and Tencent .

items.title: Amazon has the 16-inch 24GB M4 Pro MacBook Pro at $310 off today in Space Black
items.summary:
While we are still awaiting the official announcement of the new M5 Pro MacBook Pro models, the release of the base M5 has ushered in some notable discounts on the existing M4 Pro models with hundreds in savings. This morning you can add the base model 16-inch M4 Pro variant with 24GB of RAM at $310 off the list.

items.summary:

items.title: Score the new Xbox gaming handhelds at their best prices ever, now from $535 (Open-box “Excellent” w/ 1-yr. warranty)
items.summary:
Update: Best Buy now has an open-box unit of the new Xbox Ally X gaming handheld in “Excellent” condition for $949.99 shipped. That’s $50 less than its full $1,000 price and the best we’ve tracked so far. The standard Xbox ROG Ally model also available at $534.99 shipped. More details in the original post below.

If you don’t want to pay the full $600 price for a new Xbox Ally gaming handheld, Best Buy has an open box “Excellent” unit for $534.99 shipped. That’s $65 off its usual going rate, and the best price we’ve tracked for it to date. It hasn’t even been a full week since this particular handheld started shipping, so this unit is likely barely used and is hence marked to be in “like new” condition. The brand-new model, meanwhile, still sells at full price. Details below.

more…
